headline: 84% of Retail Associates Concerned About Loss Prevention, According to Latest Zebra Study
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., November 13, 2024--Zebra Technologies' 17th Annual Global Shopper Study reveals 84% of retail associates are concerned about loss prevention.

headline: Zebra Technologies : 84% of Retail Associates Concerned About Loss Prevention, According to Latest Zebra Study
summary: Lack of associate assistance, self-checkout lanes, and shelf inventory among rising shopper concerns as satisfaction dips LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill. - Nov. 13, 2024 - Zebra Technologies...
